channel.title: My username
channel.description:
Yo,
I am about to buy MC, But i am not planing on making my name haider.. does this mean i cannot play moparcraft on my new account or am i aloud to change to my new name?

item.title: My username
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

317guy:

Its not its simply changeing ur name

No…

Read full topic

item.title: My username
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:409257”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=510540.msg3704925#msg3704925 date=1312965114]

Its not its simply changeing ur name

That means i need to make a new minecraft account meaning i’ll have 2 accounts witch is against the rules.
[/quote]

once you buy your minecraft account just transfer everything from haider (residences etc) to your new account and then dont use the other account and youll be fine…[/quote]
That’s what i was planning to do, but i didn’t want to risk it incase i did get banned for multiple accounts, i just want a mod to verify it so i know i wont get banned for transfering.

Read full topic

item.title: My username
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:5, topic:409257”][quote author=317guy link=topic=510540.msg3704916#msg3704916 date=1312964487]
Its not its simply changeing ur name
[/quote]
That means i need to make a new minecraft account meaning i’ll have 2 accounts witch is against the rules.[/quote]

once you buy your minecraft account just transfer everything from haider (residences etc) to your new account and then dont use the other account and youll be fine…

Read full topic

item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“317guy, post:2, topic:409257”]you can simple change Ur Moparcraft name by clicking on profile drag ur mouse to modify profile and click fourm profile look at bottom of the page and u can change Ur RSC & MC name

(comment if this helped please)[/quote]
Your not aloud to make multiple accounts, i am asking for permission to do this

Read full topic
